    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method called when navigation thread is started. The method will loop through a one-dimensional array that alternates between x and y coordinate values at each index and assigns them correspondingly to the parameters of the method travelTo()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double destX,
                     double destY)
        Method will move the robot to the absolute field location specified by x and y coordinates
        Parameters:
        destX - The desired x coordinate to end up at
        destY - The desired y coordinate to end up at

      • turnTo

        private void turnTo(double theta)
        Method will rotate the robot to the absolute heading theta using a minimal angle
        Parameters:
        theta - Desired absolute heading

      • isNavigating

        private boolean isNavigating()
        Method returns the value of the boolean variable navigating
        Returns:
        Navigating

      • convertDistance

        private static int convertDistance(double radius,
                                   double distance)
        Method adjusts the desired distance based on the radius of the robot's wheels
        Parameters:
        radius - Wheel radius
        distance - Desired travel distance
        Returns:
        Converted distance

      • convertAngle

        private static int convertAngle(double radius,
                                double width,
                                double angle)
        Method adjusts the desired angle based on the radius of the robot's wheels and the length between its' wheels
        Parameters:
        radius - Wheel radius
        width - Length between wheels
        angle - Desired angle
